Slow Cookers: the student alternative to the air fryer

By Emma McGreevy

Megan Stoker (she/her) and Katy Leverett (she/her) discuss the benefits of slow cookers for students

The Cockpit, Leeds

Which Cake?

Yes, its that time of the year again. Valentine's Day has come and gone, and due to the lack of tacky pink fluffy nonsense falling on your doormat; it is highly likely that you'll be resorting to full fat sugary goodness to fill your emotional void. We feel your pain! In sympathy with the lack of romantic attentions that most single people are suffering from at this lonely time (reminiscent of pensioners at christmas), MUSE has gone on a quest to find the best desserts to raise your seratonin levels.

Langwith, Carrot Cake, 55p

Costcutter, "Aero" Chocolate Mousse, two for 45p

Alcuin, Danish Pastry, 65p

The Roman Baths, Parliament Street

19 Grape Lane

The Wendy House

Opporto, Leeds

Odd Socs Social on Campus

With over eighty societies on campus, York students are spoilt for choice and in the aftermath of the recent refreshers fair it is high time for those odd socs to have their say...

Kebabs

Nags Head

Oscar's

The Go Down

Packaged Pies

Kwik Save - Simply the Chicken and Vegetable Pie

Vanbrugh- Chees and Onion Pasty

Fray Bentos - Curry Pie

The Morning After

Flora Bradwell, Danusia Borucka, Debbie Kinsey and Chris Eldridge went in search of hangovers, and then their cures...

Get Funky!

The Willow

The Evil Eye

Campus Breakfasts

Veggie Option

Cereal, Yogurt and Juice

Brunchie

Positively Orgasmic!

Who'd have thought a swanky new bar in York could Hannah Dehaan to the brink of ecstacy?

Jus de Vivre

Got Freshers' Flu? Need help in creating your own healthy world? Sebastian Knox explores the benefits and satisfaction of juicing your own fruits.

Learning How to Crawl

In the spirit of good research, the MUSE team go to town to find out what York has to offer. Here's the highlights

Food for the Future

Lizzi Holman concerns herself with the FairTrade movement and how York is taking up the fight to be fair.
